org.solenopsis.keraiai

Interface SecurityMgr

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSecurityMgr, EnterpriseSecurityMgr, PartnerSecurityMgr, ToolingSecurityMgr

    public interface SecurityMgr
    Represents a way to login and out of SFDC for the enterprise, partner and tooling web services. Additionally, maintains a session that can be shared (session id).
    Author:
    Scot P. Floess

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Credentials getCredentials()
      Return the credentials.
      LoginContext getSession()
      Return a session based login context.
      LoginContext login()
      Request a new login.
      void logout()
      Force a logout.
      LoginContext resetSession(LoginContext loginContext)
      Reset a session.

    • Method Detail

      • getCredentials

        Credentials getCredentials()
        Return the credentials.
        Returns:
        the credentials.

      • getSession

        LoginContext getSession()
        Return a session based login context. A login will be called if one doesn't exist.
        Returns:
        the session based login context.

      • resetSession

        LoginContext resetSession(LoginContext loginContext)
        Reset a session.
        Parameters:
        loginContext - is the login that was being used as part of the session.
        Returns:
        the a new session based login context.

      • login

        LoginContext login()
        Request a new login.
        Returns:
        a login result from SFDC.

      • logout

        void logout()
        Force a logout.
